caption: caption the following image, describe the geometry and style. If no style / colors are present then infer what the style / colors of different regions would be. Give your answer in 150 characters. Speak in first person and do not use 'image of' or 'the picture includes'.
sketchToImg: photorealistic image, true to geometry of the sketch.

sd.systemPrompt: 8k, high resolution, 3d realistic, single object, centered, no background
